page.title: 15LIFE STYLES 2
page.content: {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF TOM:} My alarm goes of at 7 30a.m.Of course I go back to sleep.At 8 00a.m. mum wakes. Then I get up.I get washed go down stairs get my toast and cornflakes.I give my baby brother aged 2 a kiss and a hug and give mummy and dad a kiss.I walk to school.School opens at 8 30a.m. and the bell rings at 9 00a.m.We line up and go in.We do English and at 10 40 we get a break.We come in at 10 55.We then do Maths for 1 hour.We eat our lunch at 12 15 p.m.At 1 10 p.m. class begins again.We do History or Art or P.E.At 2 20 we do Hand Work or Needle Work.At 3 10 we go home and I do my homework.Then I go out to play and feed Buggsy my rabbit.After that I go out on my bike.Sometimes we play football. Then I come in to watch T.V.After tea I go out to play until it is time to come in and go to bed.
